newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia beet sugar content falls to 8.7 pct.
newsitem.headline: Russia beet sugar content falls to 8.7 pct.

text.p: Russia's third beet test, and the season's first for sugar content, showed a level of 8.7 percent from 9.5 percent at the same time last year, the Rossakhsvyokla sugar beet producers' association said Thursday.
Rossakhsvyokla said the next test would be conducted on August 1.
The organisation did not give fresh data on the number of beets per hectare, adding that the next time such data would appear would be on August 20.
